    • Method Detail

      • canPlaceCity

        public boolean canPlaceCity(shared.locations.VertexLocation location)
        Checks whether the player can place a city.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the city.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The city location is where you currently have a settlement, You have the required resources (2 wheat, 3 ore; 1 city)
        Postcondition:
        You lost the resources required to build a city (2 wheat, 3 ore; 1 city), The city is on the map at the specified location, You got a settlement back

      • canPlaceSettlement

        public boolean canPlaceSettlement(boolean free,
                                  shared.locations.VertexLocation location)
        Checks whether the player can place a settlement.
        Parameters:
        free - Whether or not piece can be built for free.
        location - The location of the settlement.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The settlement location is open, The settlement location is not on water, The settlement location is connected to one of your roads except during setup, You have the required resources (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep; 1 settlement), The settlement cannot be placed adjacent to another settlement
        Postcondition:
        You lost the resources required to build a settlement (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep; 1 settlement), The settlement is on the map at the specified location

      • canPlaceRoad

        public boolean canPlaceRoad(boolean free,
                            shared.locations.VertexLocation location)
        Checks whether the player can place a road.
        Parameters:
        free - Whether or not piece can be built for free.
        location - The location of the road.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, The road location is open, The road location is connected to another road owned by the player, The road location is not on water, You have the required resources (1 wood, 1 brick; 1 road), Setup round: Must be placed by settlement owned by the player with no adjacent road.
        Postcondition:
        You lost the resources required to build a road (1 wood, 1 brick - 1 road), The road is on the map at the specified location, If applicable, longest road has been awarded to the player with the longest road

      • canPlaySoldier

        public boolean canPlaySoldier(shared.locations.HexLocation location,
                              int victimIndex)
        Checks whether you can play a soldier development card
        Parameters:
        location - New robber location.
        victimIndex - The playerIndex of the player you wish to rob, or -1 to rob no one.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
                        It's your turn
                The client model status is 'Playing'
                You have the specific card you want to play in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non­monument dev card this turn
                The robber is not being kept in the same location
                If a player is being robbed (i.e., victimIndex != ­1)
                The player being robbed has resource cards
        Postcondition:
                        The robber is in the new location
                The player being robbed (if any) gave you one of his resource cards (randomly selected)
                If applicable, largest army has been awarded to the player who has played the most soldier cards
                You are not allowed to play other development cards during this turn (except for monument cards, which may still be played)

      • canPlayYearOfPlenty

        public boolean canPlayYearOfPlenty(shared.definitions.ResourceType resource1,
                                   shared.definitions.ResourceType resource2)
        Checks whether you can play a year of plenty card.
        Parameters:
        resource1 - The type of the first resource you'd like to receive
        resource2 - The type of the second resource you'd like to receive
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
                        It's your turn
                The client model status is 'Playing'
                You have the specific card you want to play in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non­monument dev card this turn
                Two specified resources are in the bank.
        Postcondition:
                        You gained the two specified resources

      • canPlayRoadCard

        public boolean canPlayRoadCard(shared.locations.EdgeLocation spot1,
                               shared.locations.EdgeLocation spot2)
        Checks whether a Road card can be played.
        Parameters:
        spot1 - first edge location of road.
        spot2 - second edge location of road.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
                        It's your turn
                The client model status is 'Playing'
                You have the specific card you want to play in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non­monument dev card this turn
                The first road location (spot1) is connected to one of your roads.
                The second road location (spot2) is connected to one of your roads or to the first road location (spot1)
                Neither road location is on water
                You have at least two unused roads
        Postcondition:
                        You have two fewer unused roads
                Two new roads appear on the map at the specified locations
                If applicable, longest road has been awarded to the player with the longest road

      • canPlayMonopolyCard

        public boolean canPlayMonopolyCard(shared.definitions.ResourceType resource)
        Checks whether a Monopoly card can be played.
        Parameters:
        resource - The type of resource desired from other players.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
                        It's your turn
                The client model status is 'Playing'
                You have the specific card you want to play in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non­monument dev card this turn
        Postcondition:
                        All of the other players have given you all of their resource cards of the specified type

      • canPlayMonumentCard

        public boolean canPlayMonumentCard()
        Checks whether a Monument card can be played.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
                        It's your turn
                The client model status is 'Playing'
                You have the specific card you want to play in your old dev card hand
                You have not yet played a non­monument dev card this turn
                You have enough monument cards to win the game (i.e., reach 10 victory points)
        Postcondition:
                        You gained a victory point

      • canBuyDevelopmentCard

        public boolean canBuyDevelopmentCard()
        Checks whether the player can buy a development card.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, You have the required resources (1 ore, 1 wheat, 1 sheep), There are dev cards left in the deck.
        Postcondition:
        You have a new card; If it is a monument card, it has been added to your old devcard hand, If it is a non­monument card, it has been added to your new devcard hand (unplayable this turn)

      • canTradeWithPlayer

        public boolean canTradeWithPlayer(java.util.HashMap<shared.definitions.ResourceType,java.lang.Integer> offer,
                                  int recipient)
        Checks whether the player can trade with another player
        Parameters:
        offer - list of Resources, Negative numbers mean you get those cards
        recipient - the playerIndex of the offer recipient.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, You have the resources you are offering.
        Postcondition:
        The trade is offered to the other player (stored in the server model)

      • canTradeWithMaritime

        public boolean canTradeWithMaritime(int ratio,
                                    shared.definitions.ResourceType inputResource,
                                    shared.definitions.ResourceType outputResource)
        Checks whether the player can trade with the maritime.
        Parameters:
        ratio - It must be a 2, 3, or 4.
        inputResource - Type of resource you are giving.
        outputResource - Type of resource you are receiving.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        It's your turn, You have the resources you are giving, For ratios less than 4, you have the correct port for the trade
        Postcondition:
        The trade has been executed (the offered resources are in the bank, and the requested resource has been received)

      • canRobPlayer

        public boolean canRobPlayer(shared.locations.HexLocation location,
                            int playerIndex)
        Checks whether the robber can be moved and a player robbed.
        Parameters:
        location - New location for robber.
        playerIndex - Index of player to be robbed or -1 if no is to be robbed.
        Returns:
        result
        Precondition:
        The robber is not being kept in the same location, If a player is being robbed (i.e., victimIndex != ­1), the player being robbed has resource cards
        Postcondition:
        The robber is in the new location, The player being robbed (if any) gave you one of his resource cards (randomly selected)

      • canRollDice

        public boolean canRollDice()
        Checks whether the player can roll the dice.
        Returns:
        Precondition:
        It is your turn, The client model’s status is ‘Rolling’
        Postcondition:
        The client model’s status is now in ‘Discarding’ or ‘Robbing’ or ‘Playing’

      • canSendMessage

        public boolean canSendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Checks whether the player can send a message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message the player wishes to send.
        Returns:
        Postcondition:
        The chat contains your message at the end.

      • canEndTurn

        public boolean canEndTurn()
        Checks whether the player can end the turn.
        Returns:
        result
        Postcondition:
        The cards in your new dev card hand have been transferred to your old dev card hand, It is the next player’s turn
